subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: What was originally described as a sore left knee and then later called a ruptured cyst has turned out to be more complicated for the Knicks’ Amar’e Stoudemire.
snippet: What was originally described as a sore left knee and then later called a ruptured cyst has turned out to be more complicated for the Knicks’ Amar’e Stoudemire.
